name: The Little Red Lie
storyline: Ten years have passed since the death of her grandmother. Red has come back to the forest to honor her memory. However, while there she meets a mysterious cat who reveals startling and disturbing information, setting her off on a harrowing and mysterious journey. Solve puzzles, avoiding monsters, and help Red discover the truth about what really happened years ago...
summary: 2D side scrolling, adventure, horror game where you avoid monsters and solve puzzles.
